text: | . . * Calling Sequence (Generation 3-5) — New Style - DCS (Measure and Judgement Stage) @C# - —> Vlision Algorithm Invoke Node (Behavior Tree] @C# - -> Make MsgPack input parameters from view @C# + -> NativeAdapterinvoker @C# - - Vision Native Inspection Adapter @C++ -+ —> Vision Recipes / Algorithmic Objects @C++ - TranslateParam( - Fill MsaPack input into /zCreation, InProcessing or SetParam + ProcessRecipel) - Call /zspectionModule or Execute - InterpretResultl) - Fill MsaPack output from JuiProcessing or GetAtiributes - Copy MsgPack output result buffer to Vision Native Inspection Adapter @C++ - Copy scheme on read result buffer to Vision Inspection Node @C# - Collect/Persist Item Result, Component Result Vision Native Adapter Vision Native .
